name: Styn Vercauteren
intro1: Hello! I'm a passionate Medior Frontend Developer with a Bachelor's Degree in Applied Informatics.
intro2: At 25, I've already gained valuable work and academic experience in test-driven, agile website development. I've honed my skills at Oddball / Purple Panda and DXC FDS.
intro3: Now I'm now eager to take on a new challenge as a Frontend Developer, preferably in the Antwerp area.
